comment.text: This translation key is used to display the phrase "Last modified" in a file's properties panel or similar UI component. It likely appears as a label on an information dialog box that displays details about a file or other item.

usage.context:
lineHeight="16px"
 fontWeight="600"
 noSelect
 truncate
 >
 {t("LastModified")}
 </Text>
 
 <Text
 fontSize="13px"
 lineHeight="20px"

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While 'Son dəyişiklik tarixi' is a literal translation of 'Last modified history,' it's not the idiomatic way to express 'Last modified' in Azerbaijani for technical contexts. It's overly verbose. A more suitable translation would be 'Son dəyişiklik' or 'Dəyişiklik vaxtı'.

The Armenian translation "Վերջին փոփոխությունը" translates to 'Last change' or 'Latest change' which is not a perfect match for the English 'Last modified'. While close, 'Last modified' implies a timestamp or event of modification.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using a more precise translation like "Վերջին թարմացումը" (Last update) or "Վերջին փոփոխության ամսագիրը" (Last modified date) depending on the intended meaning and context.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Lao translation 'ຄັ້ງສຸດທະຍ້າຍແກ້ໄຂ' is a literal translation of 'Last modified' but doesn't convey the meaning naturally in Lao. It's overly formal and doesn't sound idiomatic.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ເກືອນສຸດແກ້ໄຂ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While 'ຄັ້ງສຸດທະຍ້າຍແກ້ໄຂ' is technically correct, a more natural and understandable translation would improve the user experience.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ປັບແກ້ໄຂຄັ້ງສຸດທະຍ້າຍ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Sinhala translation "අන්තිම වශයෙන් වෙනස් කරන ලද්දේ" is a rather literal and verbose translation of "Last modified". While grammatically correct, it's not the most natural or concise way to express the meaning in Sinhala. A more common and fluent translation would be "වසංගනය terakhir" (last changed) or "අවසාන වෙනස්කම" (final change).

While "Lần sửa đổi cuối" is understandable, a more natural and accurate translation of "Last modified" in this context would be "Thời gian sửa đổi cuối cùng" or "Cập nhật lần cuối". "Lần sửa đổi cuối" emphasizes the act of modification rather than the timestamp or date of the last modification.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Thời gian sửa đổi cuối cùng
